com.fasterxml.clustermate.service.cluster.ActiveNodeState

    Package Description
    com.fasterxml.clustermate.service
    Package contains basic building that are useful for building actual services around StoreMate store implementation.
    com.fasterxml.clustermate.service.bdb
    Package that contains BDB-JE based implementations of metadata stores ClusterMate needs.
